nbttag: {ench:[],HideFlags:254,display:{Lore:[0:"§8Consumed on use",1:"",2:"§7§7Pet items can boost pets in",3:"§7various ways but pets can only",4:"§7hold 1 item at a time so choose",5:"§7wisely!",6:"",7:"§7§7While unequipped this pet",8:"§7gains §a25% §7of the equipped",9:"§7pet's xp, this is split between",10:"§7all pets holding the item",11:"",12:"§7§eRight click on your pet to",13:"§egive it this item!",14:"",15:"§5§lEPIC PET ITEM"],Name:"§5Exp Share"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"PET_ITEM_EXP_SHARE"}}
